downloadTitle: Deployment Guide For Microsoft Sharepoint Server 2010 Beta
downloadDescription: The book covers information about the basic fundamentals of deploying Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 Beta
detailsSection: This document supports a preliminary release of Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 Beta. The content in the book covers information about installing, configuring, and upgrading to SharePoint Server 2010 Beta.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
